alert.note: Alert for Collin; Hopkins; Hunt; Kaufman; Rains; Rockwall; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rockwall, Hunt, northeastern Kaufman, northwestern Van Zandt, southwestern Hopkins, northwestern Rains and southeastern Collin Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Tawakoni, or 11 miles north of Wills Point, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockwall, Greenville, Terrell, Wills Point, Royse City, Fate, Farmersville, West Tawakoni, Quinlan, Caddo Mills, East Tawakoni, Point, Cumby, Campbell, Hawk Cove, Merit, Lake Tawakoni, Greenville City Lakes, Greenville Club Lake, and Lake Tawakoni State Park. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 73 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Collin; Hopkins; Hunt; Kaufman; Rains; Rockwall; Van Zandt
